attributes.action: Stop the DC100 becoming the new Land Rover Defender.
attributes.additional_details: The DC100 is likley to be the new Land Rover Defender. I feel that the new look is not in keeping with the essence of the present vehicle or any other Land Rover models. It would be the end of a line that has be going for over 50 yrs.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the manufacturer.
